help-file.title: "CALL OF THE GRAVE"
help-file.content: Drawing upon the power of the damned the Dreadlord shrieks out an ominous chant, leaving the air thick and deathly still. Skeletons rise from their cold graves within the earth beneath, tearing and clawing at the foe of their new Deathlord master, wreaking physical damage as they attempt to bring them down.
